posts.post_content:
Bought a few T206's in Sterling Sports recent auction that I thought one of my customers needed---he had gotten them without updating his list so here they are at the hammer price and I will "eat" the buyer's premium...I have noted the auction # from this recent auction if you like to see the scans etc.  Free shipping and payment by paypal gift or ck pls

McCormick  Cycle 350 PSA 1---only 2 ever graded by PSA and both are PSA 1
$120 (lot # 90)

Moran Chiocago Tolstoi  psa 3    $120  (lot # 97)

Doc White portrait,  Old M ill  PSA 2.5  $110 (lot # 127)

Bill Latzko  [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]   770 873 1181

if by ck my new address is 3466 Kiveton Drive Norcross Ga 30092
